feature_model.name: JPlug

meta.data: This is a sample feature model of a IDE product line

Periklis Sochos, Matthias Riebisch, and Ilka Philippow. Feature-oriented development of software product lines: Mapping feature models to the architecture. In Springer, editor, Lecture notes in computer science, pages 138-152. Net.ObjectDays, 2004.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r jplug :m interface :g [1,1] : sdi (sdi) : mdi :o gui_builder (gui_builder) :m java :o qt :o model_code_synch (model_code_synch) :o compiler :g [1,*] : javac : mvc :o diagram_builder (diagram_builder) :m uml :o petri_net
